Improve IEA Ghana Industry Electricity data from 1974 through 2017

fix_GHA_industry_electricity.Rd

Ghana's Industry Electricity data are specified for Mining and quarrying, Non-ferrous metals, and Textiles and leather for the year 1971--1973 only. However, data are available from the Ghana Grid Company (GridCo) and the Volta River Authority that fill most remaining years to 2017. The details to fill the extra years are in the object Fixed_GHA_Industry_Electricity. This function applies the fixes to years that are available in .tidy_iea_data.

fix_GHA_industry_electricity(
  .tidy_iea_df,
  col_names = IEATools::iea_cols,
  country = col_names$country,
  method = col_names$method,
  energy_type = col_names$energy_type,
  last_stage = col_names$last_stage,
  ledger_side = col_names$ledger_side,
  flow_aggregation_point = col_names$flow_aggregation_point,
  flow = col_names$flow,
  product = col_names$product,
  unit = col_names$unit,
  year = col_names$year
)

Arguments

.tidy_iea_df

a tidy IEA data frame produced by load_tidy_iea_df()
col_names

a list of column names in IEA data frames. Default is IEATools::iea_cols.
country

the name of the country column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$country.
method

the name of the method column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$method.
energy_type

the name of the energy type column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$energy_type.
last_stage

the name of the last stage column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$last_stage.
ledger_side

the name of the ledger side column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$ledger_side.
flow_aggregation_point

the name of the flow aggregation point column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$flow_aggregation_point.
flow

the name of the flow column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$flow.
product

the name of the product column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$product.
unit

the name of the unit column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$unit.
year

the name of the year column in .tidy_iea_df. Default is col_names$year.

Value

.tidy_iea_df with smoothed Ghana Primary solid biofuels data

Details

See the Supplemental information to M. K. Heun and P. E. Brockway. Meeting 2030 primary energy and economic growth goals: Mission impossible? Applied Energy, 251(112697):1–24, May 2019 for additional details.

Also see the file named "GHA-IndustryElectricity.xlsx" for the actual calculations.

Examples

library(dplyr)
example_tidy_iea_df <- load_tidy_iea_df() %>%
  filter(Country == "GHA")
example_tidy_iea_df
#> # A tibble: 122 x 11
#>    Country Method Energy.type Last.stage  Year Ledger.side Flow.aggregatio…
#>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr>       <chr>      <dbl> <chr>       <chr>           
#>  1 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  2 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  3 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  4 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  5 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  6 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  7 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  8 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#>  9 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#> 10 GHA     PCM    E           Final       1971 Supply      Total primary e…
#> # … with 112 more rows, and 4 more variables: Flow <chr>, Product <chr>,
#> #   Unit <chr>, E.dot <dbl>
fixed <- example_tidy_iea_df %>%
  fix_GHA_industry_electricity()
# Compare changed values
example_tidy_iea_df %>%
  filter(Flow %in% c("Mining and quarrying",
                     "Non-ferrous metals",
                     "Textile and leather",
                     "Industry not elsewhere specified"),
         Product == "Electricity") %>%
  select("Year", "Flow", "E.dot", "Unit")
#> # A tibble: 5 x 4
#>    Year Flow                              E.dot Unit 
#>   <dbl> <chr>                             <dbl> <chr>
#> 1  1971 Mining and quarrying              16.7  ktoe 
#> 2  1971 Non-ferrous metals               170.   ktoe 
#> 3  1971 Textile and leather                1.46 ktoe 
#> 4  1971 Industry not elsewhere specified  21.9  ktoe 
#> 5  2000 Industry not elsewhere specified 370.   ktoe 
fixed %>%
  filter(Flow %in% c("Mining and quarrying",
                     "Non-ferrous metals",
                     "Textile and leather",
                     "Industry not elsewhere specified"),
         Product == "Electricity") %>%
  select("Year", "Flow", "E.dot", "Unit")
#> # A tibble: 8 x 4
#>    Year Flow                              E.dot Unit 
#>   <dbl> <chr>                             <dbl> <chr>
#> 1  1971 Mining and quarrying              16.7  ktoe 
#> 2  1971 Non-ferrous metals               170.   ktoe 
#> 3  1971 Textile and leather                1.46 ktoe 
#> 4  1971 Industry not elsewhere specified  21.9  ktoe 
#> 5  2000 Mining and quarrying              45.4  ktoe 
#> 6  2000 Non-ferrous metals               219.   ktoe 
#> 7  2000 Textile and leather                2.27 ktoe 
#> 8  2000 Industry not elsewhere specified 104.   ktoe 
# Show that new data are still in balance
example_tidy_iea_df %>%
  filter(Year == 2000,
         Product == "Electricity",
         Flow == "Industry not elsewhere specified") %>%
  select(E.dot) %>%
  as.numeric()
#> [1] 370.2494
fixed %>%
  filter(Year == 2000,
         Product == "Electricity",
         Flow %in% c("Mining and quarrying",
                     "Non-ferrous metals",
                     "Textile and leather",
                     "Industry not elsewhere specified")) %>%
  select(E.dot) %>%
  sum()
#> [1] 370.2494
